title: Esentia Sees Data Centers in Mexico Fueling Demand for Pipelines
description: Mexico’s Esentia Energy Development expects a boom in data centers to bolster its pipeline business, as the country races to build out energy and AI infrastructure to compete with its regional peers.
content: (Bloomberg) Mexicos Esentia Energy Development expects a boom in data centers to bolster its pipeline business, as the country races to build out energy and AI infrastructure to compete with its regi… [+3848 chars]
